Dissertations

Since the early 2000s research on PLS methods has been a fertile ground for new proposals and developments. Without being an exhaustive list, here are some PhD dissertations on PLS and related methods written in the last 10+ years.

Approches PLS Multi-Tableaux

Approches PLS linéaires et non-linéaires pour la modélisation de multi-tableaux: théorie et applications

  • Author: Myrtille Vivien
  • Year: December 2002
  • Language: French
  • download pdf

 

Fuzzy Regression and PLS Path Modeling

Fuzzy Regression and PLS Path Modeling: a combined two-stage approach for multi-block analysis

  • Author: Rosaria Romano
  • Year: November 2006
  • Language: English
  • download pdf

 

Contributions aux SEM

Contributions aux modèles d'équations structurelles à variables latentes

  • Author: Emmanuel Jakobowicz
  • Year: October 2007
  • Language: French
  • download pdf

 

Unobserved Heterogeneity in SEM

Unobserved Heterogeneity in SEM: a new approach to latent class detection in PLS Path Modeling

  • Author: Laura Trinchera
  • Year: November 2007
  • Language: English
  • download pdf

 

Description et Prédiction de données multi-tableaux

Description et Prédiction à partir de données structurées en plusieurs tableaux. Application en épidemiologie animale

  • Author: Stéphanie Bougeard
  • Year: December 2007
  • Language: French
  • download pdf

 

Régression PLS et Données Censurées

Régression PLS et Données Censurées

  • Author: Philippe Bastien
  • Year: March 2008
  • Language: French
  • download pdf

 

Pathmox Approach

Pathmox Approach: Segmentation Trees in Partial Least Squares Path Modeling

  • Author: Gaston Sanchez
  • Year: July 2009
  • Language: English
  • download pdf

 

PLS Methods for Non-Metric Data

Partial Least Squares Methods for Non-Metric Data

  • Author: Giorgio Russolillo
  • Year: November 2009
  • Language: English
  • download pdf

 

SEM with ordinal manifest variables

SEM with ordinal manifest variables: An Alternating Least Squares approach

  • Author: Daniela Nappo
  • Year: November 2009
  • Language: English
  • download pdf

 

Patent Value Models

Patent Value Models: Partial Least Squares Path Modeling with Mode C and Few Indicators

  • Author: Alba Martínez Ruíz
  • Year: 2011
  • Language: English
  • Link

 

OnPLS

OnPLS: Orthogonal Projections to Latent Structures in Multiblock and Path Model Data Analysis

  • Author: Tommy Löfstedt
  • Year: June 2012
  • Language: English
  • download pdf

 

Comparing CSA, PLSPM, and GSCA

Comparación de la eficiencia en la estimación de parámetros entre CSA, PLSPM, y GSCA

  • Author: Edgardo Daniel Miranda Zapata
  • Year: 2012
  • Language: Spanish
  • download pdf

 

Factorial Analysis of Data with Multigroup Structure

Analyses factorielles de données structurées en groupes d'individus. Application en biologie

  • Author: Aida Eslami
  • Year: October 2013
  • Language: English
  • Coming soon

 

General Non-Metric PLS

Análisis Conjunto de Múltiples Tablas de Datos Mixtos Mediante PLS

  • Author: Víctor Manuel González Rojas
  • Year: November 2014
  • Language: Spanish
  • Link
